text: Agek Jisas pen agak, Yad binɨb dɨl kod mɨdebin ak, bɨnonɨm lum awl mɨdebal tek ma mɨdebin agak. Yad lum awl bɨnonɨm mɨdebɨnep tek, Juda bɨawl okok yɨp nag lun agel, binɨb yad okok tɨkjakɨl, kɨli ayɨp penpen ñapɨlap agak. Pen yad binɨb dɨl kod mɨdebin ak anɨb ak ke mɨdeb, bɨnonɨm lum awl mɨdebal tek mel agak.
